title: Why I dont like Top lane
body:
top lane is the "gank that bitch" lane. I feel like top lane gets at least 70% of the ganks and the lane is huge and curvy so i feel very unsafe in that lane. it's just too much going on. i feel like even though mid is in the middle and can get ganked by the entire team on both sides, i still feel safer cuz its just smaller. even bot is better cuz at least you have two people to help each other plus a champ who's warding the region. top offers the least protection and even gets the most neglect usually. it drags out the longest and you'll find your top laners still dueling like 27 minutes into the game with both towers still up. 

tl:dr delete top lane
